title: ocean week statue ?
body: anyone heard any updates about the ocean week statue/artificial reef event thing that happened a couple of months ago such as if a location has been chosen or how close the statue is to completion.

replies.body:
We're doing site exploration. It's a slow process because there's a lot to evaluate and we have to make sure it's the right place. We get a lot of advice in this process from the partners we are working with.

CptStupendous has more in his last update:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/7oUEHw5V-ocean-week-reef-update
Yeah, I did my games. Cant wait to see a stature with my summoner name on it XD
